text: Robin Benway is an author from Orange County, USA. She attended college at both New York University and the University of California at Los Angeles. She is most known for her young adult novels, Audrey, Wait! (2008) and The Extraordinary Secrets of April, May & June (2010). She also wrote the Also Known As series.http://www.robinbenway.com/ Her book, Far from the Tree, won the 2017 National Book Award for Young People's Literature. ==Books== *2017: Far from the Tree *2015: Emmy & Oliver *2014: Going Rogue *2013: Also Known As *2010: The Extraordinary Secrets of April, May & June *2008: Audrey, Wait! ==References== ==External links== *Official site *Interview with Benway at Publishers Weekly (June 4, 2015) Category:American writers of young adult literature Category:American women writers Category:Living people Category:New York University alumni Category:University of California, Los Angeles alumni Category:Women writers of young adult literature Category:American children's writers Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
